thread.title: Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone
thread.title_full: Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone

title: Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone
text:
> Sports Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone New Jersey Devils head coach John Hynes diagrams a play for his team during a timeout during the third period against the Philadelphia Flyers in an NHL preseason hockey game in Newark, N.J., Friday, Oct 2, 2015. The Devils defeated the Flyers 3-2. (AP Photo/Rich Schultz)
